# Reference
<!-- DO NOT EDIT: This document was generated by Puppet Strings -->

## Table of Contents

**Tasks**

* [`init`](#init): Executes an arbitrary shell command on the target system
* [`linux`](#linux): Execute an arbitrary shell command (without a puppet agent)
* [`windows`](#windows): Execute an arbitrary shell command (without a puppet agent)

## Tasks

### init

Executes an arbitrary shell command on the target system

**Supports noop?** false

#### Parameters

##### `command`

Data type: `String[1]`

The command to run, including all arguments

##### `interleave`

Data type: `Optional[Boolean]`

Interleave the stdout and stderr streams.(default: true)

##### `failonfail`

Data type: `Optional[Boolean]`

Should the task fail if the command exits nonzero.(default: true)

### linux

Execute an arbitrary shell command (without a puppet agent)

**Supports noop?** false

#### Parameters

##### `command`

Data type: `String[1]`

The command to run, including all arguments.

### windows

Execute an arbitrary shell command (without a puppet agent)

##### `command`

The command to run, including all arguments.
